accurate_docstring: When the light is on and the door is open, turn on the TV and close the door. Or if the door is open, close the door.
When it is Friday, send my friend an email and plus the invite times. If he doesn't reply, plus the reject time and if the reject time equal the invite time, send he another email.
Turn off your lights when one tap on your phone button.
When there is movement at the entrance, turn on the voice assistant and broadcast the weather.
When there is movement at the front door, adjust the lighting, play happy birthday music and display photos.
Control the Christmas lights, play Merry Christmas music, change the ambiance lights and control the projectors.
